reviewText: My 5 and 3 year old sons love this CD so much, they play it every night before bed. I love the lessons and the principles contained in each show.

We bought this for our toddler, who always wants songs in the car. After memorizing the fisher-price cd, we got a Veggie Tales story cd in a kid's meal. Our toddler loved it, and it has a good storyline. We bought this one to add to her rotation, she loves the stories and the catchy songs, and we enjoy them as well.

My kids love this (ages 2-6). The stories are very clever, and it is entertaining for adults, too, the first 2 or 3 times. Then I got sick of it, but my kids have listened to the CD at least 10 times and still love it. One warning: there is one mild potty joke, and one character speaks with a silly voice your child may want to mimick.
